data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

A person takes 10 steps forward and 9 steps left. Someone steps forward and 9 steps right. People take 10 steps backward and 9 steps right. Taking 9 steps right and 9 steps left results in 1 + 10 = 13 steps. So, the answer is 13.
